abstract: Chicago Blackhawks rout Detroit Red Wings, 5-2; other hockey scores noted.
snippet: Patrick Kane had a goal and an assist 1 minutes 24 seconds apart on power plays in the second period and Artemi Panarin scored twice, helping the Chicago Blackhawks rout the host Detroit Red Wings, 5-2.
lead_paragraph: Patrick Kane had a goal and an assist 1 minutes 24 seconds apart on power plays in the second period and Artemi Panarin scored twice, helping the Chicago Blackhawks rout the host Detroit Red Wings, 5-2.
